TopicTitle: Warp Drive may be possible within our lifetime!!!!!!!!

Articles.Content:
This probably doesn't go in general discussion, but dammit everyone should read this!!!!! It's an article about NASA scientists working right now on the first "warp" style propulsion:

http://gizmodo.com/5942634/nasa-starts-development-of-real-life-star-trek-warp-drive

Discuss!! Does this mean warp travel to extra-kerbol planets might not be so far fetched for KSP?!!! (or indeed real life)
